ygData.subject: Screech and horn
ygData.msgSnippet: I was killing HG last night with a group that contained another bard and the other bard told me that using a horn doesn t increase the effectiveness of
ygData.messageBody:
I was killing HG last night with a group that contained another bard and the
other bard told me that using a horn doesn't increase the effectiveness of
Screech. Is this correct? Does the song just check your brass skill but
actually using a horn doesn't do anything?

It seems to me that if a song has a specific skill listed that using the
associated instrument would increase its affect.

Ruldaas Riverdance - hating Hell #2
